snippet.title: Azmar Quest (Text-Based RPG) Demo is Now on Steam with a new Trailer!
snippet.description:
The Azmar Quest Demo is finally available!

Steam announcement for the Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/3474140/view/511824774162284804

Azmar Quest Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3474140/Azmar_Quest_Old_School_RPG/

You can play through the first 2 Chapters of the game and get a taste of what's to come in the full game!

What is Azmar Quest?

Azmar Quest is a text-based RPG, with turn-based battles and old-school vibes. The single-player main story should last at least 20 hours, then there's a lot of additional content! And if you play online, you can also fight in PvP and play Dungeons. Choose your class and let the adventure begin!

Demo Limitations:

Please note that the demo has the following limitations:

• Only the first 2 Chapters are available. The first chapter is mostly designed to introduce you to the game.
• Only 2 Extra Missions are available.
• The maximum level is 10.
• Most extra game modes (2v2 battles, party-based 3v3 battles) are inaccessible because they require a higher level or specific points in the story to unlock.
• You can only play in single-player mode. You cannot sign in to play online, so you don't have access to PvP battles and online events, and you can't queue for a Dungeon.

Thanks for trying Azmar Quest! As a solo-developer, I hope you enjoy the demo!

#steam  #rpg  #indiegame  #pcgaming  #azmarquest
